means: 以颤抖可怜的声音说出

sentence.Network_en: He heard the bleat of a lamb.
She wanted to scream, but all that would come out was this faint bleat.
sentence.Network_cn: 她想尖叫，但最终只是发出了这么微弱的呻吟。

sentence.Network_en: There came the bleat of horns.

A calf / lamb / goat bleats ., 小牛 / 小羊 / 山羊叫.
王文昌主编：英语搭配大词典  pdf 英汉 -... ... 「虎啸」 Tigers growl； 「羊咩咩叫」 Sheep bleat； 「猪呼噜呼噜叫」 Pigs grunt；.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  blǣtan, of imitative origin

entry.def: When a sheep or goat bleats, it makes the sound that sheep and goats typically make.

example.ex: From the slope below, the wild goats bleated faintly.
example.tran: 山坡下面，野山羊咩咩地轻声叫着。

example.ex: ...a small flock of bleating ewes and lambs.
example.tran: 一小群咩咩叫的母羊和羊羔

entry.tran: 微弱地尖声诉说；羊叫般地说
entry.def: If someone bleats, they speak in a weak, high voice.

example.tran: “我不想要它，”埃里克微弱地尖声说。

entry.def: If you say that someone bleats about something, you mean that they complain about it in a way which makes them sound weak and irritating.

example.ex: They are always bleating about 'unfair' foreign competition...
example.tran: 他们总是抱怨“不公平的”外国竞争。

example.ex: Don't come bleating to me every time something goes wrong.
example.tran: 不要一有问题就跑来向我哭诉。

means.word_mean: 1. the sound of sheep or goats (or any sound resembling this)

auth_sentence.content: Just don't bleat when you are on the receiving end.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just don't bleat when you are on the receiving end.

auth_sentence.content: His barkings loud...Amid their tremulous bleat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His barkings loud...Amid their tremulous bleat.

auth_sentence.content: Evidently, "sane" people just bleat their way to slaughter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Evidently, "sane" people just bleat their way to slaughter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Evidently, "sane" people just bleat their way to slaughter.

means.word_mean: (羊, 小牛)叫, 咩咩的叫
